announce_text: Within the last couple days the Icarus Military Port has confiscated contraband from an illegal smuggling ship running narcotics to a nearby planet, after docking the ship to the port and running through the cargo they found an alien specimen contained within a cryostasis tube. Shortly after all this, communications between the TGMC and the military port was cut-off but not before the report of a threat appearing on the station getting through to high command. As such your ship has been designated by the TGMC high command to dispatch any threats aboard the military port and find out what happened.
